Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Class DataUriUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.aafwk.ability.DataUriUtils

  • public class DataUriUtils
extends Object
    A utility class used for handling Uri objects that use the dataability scheme.
    Since:
    3
    See Also:
    Uri
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

      • DataUriUtils

        public DataUriUtils​()

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public static long getId​(Uri dataUri)
        Obtains the ID attached to the end of the path component of the given URI.
        Parameters:
        dataUri - Indicates the Uri object from which the ID is to be obtained.
        Returns:
        Returns the ID attached to the end of the path component; returns -1 if the given dataUri does not contain a path component.
        Throws:
        NumberFormatException - Throws this exception if the last segment of the path component is not a number.
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if dataUri is null.
        Since:
        3

      • attachId

        public static Uri attachId​(Uri dataUri,
                           long id)
        Attaches the given ID to the end of the path component of the given URI.
        Parameters:
        dataUri - Indicates the Uri object to which the ID is to be attached.
        id - Indicates the ID to attach.
        Returns:
        Returns the Uri object with the given ID attached.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the uri is illegal
        Since:
        3

      • deleteId

        public static Uri deleteId​(Uri dataUri)
        Deletes the ID from the end of the path component of the given URI.
        Parameters:
        dataUri - Indicates the Uri object from which the ID is to be deleted.
        Returns:
        Returns the Uri object with the ID deleted.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if dataUri is null or does not contain a path component.
        NumberFormatException - Throws this exception if the last segment of the path component is not a number.
        Since:
        3

      • updateId

        public static Uri updateId​(Uri dataUri,
                           long id)
        Updates the ID in the specified dataUri.
        Parameters:
        dataUri - Indicates the Uri object to be updated.
        id - Indicates the new ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the updated Uri object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the format of the specified dataUri is incorrect.
        NumberFormatException - Throws this exception if the last segment of the path in the specified dataUri is not a number.
        Since:
        4
